I‚Äôm an MPA student at the London School of Economics, specializing in Economic Policy. My work sits at the intersection of economics, data storytelling, and visualization‚ÄîI believe complex economic concepts should be accessible and engaging.

Background

Economics Storyteller - Translating data into narratives that inform policy decisions
Data Visualization Specialist - Creating clear, impactful visualizations using modern tools
Policy Researcher - Contributing to innovative projects in digital finance and economic analysis



Recent Work

Bank for International Settlements - Contributed to Project Agor√†, exploring tokenization and wholesale central bank digital currencies
Bank of England Collaboration - Worked on cutting-edge research in digital finance
Quantitative Analysis - Experience with econometric modeling, time series analysis, and statistical methods



Connect
